#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

unsigned int rev(unsigned int n) {
    unsigned int res=0;
    while(n) {
        res=res*10+n%10;
        n/=10;
    }
    return res;
}

bool palindrome(unsigned int n) {
    int revn=rev(n);
    while(n && revn) {
        if((n%10) !=(revn%10)) {
            return false;
        }
        n/=10;
        revn/=10;
    }
    return true;
}

int main() {
    int test;
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--) {
        unsigned int n, ans=0;
        scanf("%u", &n);
        while(!palindrome(n)) {
            unsigned int temp=rev(n);
            n+=temp;
            ans++;
        }
        printf("%u %u\n", ans, n);
    }
}
